title: tantiram tannai
sahitya:
tantiram tannai shollaiyA indap-piravi tandenai dondattil panditta vindaiyin


anupallavi

  vandadum pOnadum cintai ninaindiDa vArA vazhiyinait-tArAdenaiyinum kArAgrahattinil OrAiduttiDum


caraNam    unnaiyanri vErE ulagum enakkillai uDalum enakkillai uravum enakkillai annaiyappA unnai
oppavarum illai anbu nI naNbu nI paNbu nI tiNbu nI arivu nI niraivu nI Ananda guruvu nI
